text: John Arnold Bredenkamp (11 August 1940 â€“ 18 June 2020) was a Zimbabwean businessman and rugby union player. He founded the Casalee Group. He died on 18 June 2020 from kidney failure at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Rugby union players Category:Zimbabwean businesspeople
